definitions: the state or condition of being a fan of someone or something

examples.text: an extensive questionnaire determined levels of Harry Potter fandom on a scale of one to five

shortDefinitions: state or condition of being fan

definitions: the fans of a particular person, team, fictional series, etc. regarded collectively as a community or subculture

examples.text: of course, every fandom has its extreme members

shortDefinitions: fans of particular person, team, fictional series, etc.
